findings.title: Consider changing the way distributed tokens are accounted
findings.description: When distributing tokens, avoid resetting variables 'investors[_address].tokens' and 'investors[_address].contribution' to 0 as it breaks the link between buyers and token amounts. Instead, add a boolean variable in the Investor struct indicating whether tokens have been distributed.

findings.title: Function redistributeTokens does not account for recipients tokens
findings.description: The function remove tokens from the original investor and does not add them to the receiving investor mapping, breaking an implicit invariant that the tokensPurchased must be equal to the sum of the investors tokens and opens the possibility for unaccounted tokens.

findings.title: Decimals into constant
findings.description: Consider saving the decimal cases(10**18) into a constant to avoid magic numbers throughout the contract.
